website_summaries.verdict: A three-cup food chopper and six-cup blender share a base to save you space.
pros: Stainless steel blade.Six-cup dishwasher-safe glass jar
Boasts 1,000 power watts and 600 blending watts

customer_reviews.title: Not as tough as it looks!
customer_reviews.text: I chose this because I thought it would be more sturdy than the others since the blender is glass. The base is flimsy and light, the lid comes off of the blender when in use, the food processor portion comes apart at the base and lid during even the lightest use and the motor is terribly loud. If I had had the chance to touch it in a store I would have never purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Cassy

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but not worth going deaf
customer_reviews.text: Get your industrial strength ear protectors on, this blender is so LOUD I cannot bear to use it. Also, it is about as basic an item as you can get. Looks nice, but not worth going deaf.
customer_reviews.author: Asa Brebner

customer_reviews.title: Housing is cheap plastic, not the chrome plated steel ...
customer_reviews.text: Housing is cheap plastic, not the chrome plated steel of my earlier model. Cheap flimsy feel to the base. It gets an extra star for the improvements to the blade and jar design from the previous classic.
customer_reviews.author: John Stempin

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Have had to replace parts three times, this is a horrible quality blender. Now amazon window is closed to return and was closed within the first 30 days of blender breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Svabik

customer_reviews.title: Hate
customer_reviews.text: It caught fire the first time i used it making smoothies
customer_reviews.author: JT Brown

customer_reviews.title: Blender unscrews itself from base.
customer_reviews.text: Powerful motor vibrates and unscrews cup base from glass receptacle. Contents will end up on floor if not attended continuously. Blends well but cup base has to be tightened and positioned properly against keeper tooth on motor base. Not the thing that guests at party would ever use. Forget the margaritas. Probably should include a mop and sponge with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: At high speed the blade assembly vibrates and slowly rotates ...
customer_reviews.text: At high speed the blade assembly vibrates and slowly rotates until the base rubber seal pushes out causing leakage.
customer_reviews.author: John Miller

customer_reviews.title: Oster blenders are excellent
customer_reviews.text: Oster blenders are excellent. They are built to last and the price makes it very affordable. Oster is a name that delivers quality and value.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Good piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Not as powerful as my old beehive. But not as noisey as my old beevive blender. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional power
customer_reviews.text: This is a very powerful blender. Love the style and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: LORI A. ROGERS

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I started making smoothies almost daily and this unit is Great. I like that it doesn't have a million different settings. Easy cleaning Very Nice
customer_reviews.author: INFUSINO

customer_reviews.title: Use it daily to make fruit smoothies
customer_reviews.text: Great blender for fruit smoothies. Grinds well. I just use yogurt, banana, frozen strawberries and frozen blueberries. No liquid and it makes phenomenal smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: Brandygirl

customer_reviews.title: Blender is sturdy, quick to complete tasks.
customer_reviews.text: this blender is a workhouse . Drawbacks: It is loud, and you cannot replace the smoothie blade.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Husband

customer_reviews.title: Best Blender I Ever Owned
customer_reviews.text: Best Blender I Ever Owned. Some Extra Sound But It Does Have Extra Power. I Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mikeymike

customer_reviews.title: It came broken but great product
customer_reviews.text: I know it's a really good product but I had to buy in another store, because the glass came completely broken. I couldn't even open it, I just heard all the loose glasses
customer_reviews.author: Marsromans

customer_reviews.title: Jammed blade
customer_reviews.text: Great blender until the blade jammed. About to embark on the exciting journey of finding a replacement while it's still under warranty
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: toggle switch won't move
customer_reviews.text: opened it out of the box and set it up, toggle switch won't move! what a piece of junk! I will have to return. Learned my lesson and won't get another.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth R Hake

customer_reviews.title: Not worthy money.
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly made. Unstable on the counter. It leaks from the cover. I would not recommend It.
customer_reviews.author: Maria N. Lagonik

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, simple use, Oyster brand confidence and great price. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Olivier, M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy on off feature blades are great, nice heavy glass
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Oster never lets us down. We make smoothies at ...
customer_reviews.text: Oster never lets us down. We make smoothies at the house constantly, and using an Oster blender is always preferred.
customer_reviews.author: ReeseBSG

customer_reviews.title: Inferior Product, DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Worst blender yet. Purchased May 23, and today on Jan 4, blender part, no barely turning when the motor is on. I'm an almost daily blender user and though I've been through many over the years, this one has had the shortest lifespan. Wish I could get my money back, Oster should be ashamed to have their name on this garbage, DO NOT BUY!!! #Oster #poorquality
customer_reviews.author: david manchester

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Wow, not the Oster of old. used gently for 6 months making smoothies and the blade assembly has frozen up. Big disappointment!@!@!
customer_reviews.author: bubblehead99

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this blender it makes the best smoothies with all kinds of frozen fruit has awesome power.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: You need to buy this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mixer!!! Blends everything so well without having to stop the mixer and scraping the sides down and starting the mixer back up again...it’s very powerful!
customer_reviews.author: L. Ledford

customer_reviews.title: I like the color since it goes well in my kitchen ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't fully used this to it's capacity yet which is why I only gave 4 stars. I like the color since it goes well in my kitchen and works great for the salsa I've made. 11.24.19 updated to 5 stars, love this blender!
customer_reviews.author: Patty Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loving the blender, but it's incredibly loud, and especially so when you use the plastic food processor adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio J

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Met all expectations. Good product for the price. Don't expect it to stand up to heavy use, like frozen margaritas.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Casto

customer_reviews.title: JUNK!!!
customer_reviews.text: It makes you give at least 1 star. I wish i could give negative stars! This thing has trouble blending 2 cups of smashed berries! My old cheap blender could bend a fresh banana, 1 cup frozen berries, I cup frozen peaches and only 1/4 cup juice for ice cream consistency. The directions for crushing ice says: use 6 ice cubes and fill with water then pulse and drain. RIDICULOUS! I'm requesting my money back for the blender and the 4 year warranty I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: brenda brunner

customer_reviews.title: It will be put to good use once I recover fully
customer_reviews.text: I have used it only once since I was in the hospital for a week and am just now recovering. It will be put to good use once I recover fully.
customer_reviews.author: Viola L. Bohn

customer_reviews.title: Does not work properly
customer_reviews.text: This blender so eems to have come missing a piece on the bottom of the pitcher part. It slips out of the lock position when in use and gives off a strong odor of burning plastic. We are very very disappointed and feel the item should be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: capuletdesign

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the $$$$, would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Charles H. Brannen Jr.

customer_reviews.title: I was trying to blend softened ice cream and cool whip and it did not blend at all
customer_reviews.text: The whirlwind blender does not grind effectively or even move the food around. I was trying to blend softened ice cream and cool whip and it did not blend at all. I had to use a spatula to keep moving it to get them mixed. If I had opened and tried the blending earlier, i would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Product is no good!
customer_reviews.text: It does nothing t work! Horrible product! I just opened it and tried to use it. Product does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Elsa V. Amezquita

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage. I purchased it to make smoothies with water, protein powder and frozen berries. After 60 seconds, the berries were all still whole. Also VERY LOUD. DO NOT waste your moey on this "blender".
customer_reviews.author: Natural Woman

customer_reviews.title: Ain't What It Used To Be
customer_reviews.text: It does work. But, wow. I sure wish I had my Mom's Osterizer. This one is pitiful. "All metal drive" is its selling point. But the base feels cheap and flimsy. The lid feels cheap and way too brittle. The cord is about 6" long, and I'm only exaggerating a little bit. I'm sure they cut THEIR costs by using a shorter cord, but now we had to buy an extension cord to use it. Only buy this if it's on sale. Otherwise, not worth the $$$.
customer_reviews.author: 810 Worly

customer_reviews.title: Why buy anything else
customer_reviews.text: All I want is something to make smoothies with. All I need is an On/Off button and pulse. I've never used any of the other settings on my last blender. Why do people spend $500 on a blender? I don't get it. This is the best value for the money. Plus it comes with an AMAZING smoothie blade! How have I ever lived without a smoothie blade?! For fun I also purchased the milkshake blade that is compatible with this blender. Yum! I love this blender. Oh, and it comes with a nice big glass pitcher. I hate the old plastic pitchers they used to come with.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: THE BASE UNSCREWS ITSELF WHILE RUNNING!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, what's the deal? Every third or fourth time we use this blender, it unscrews while running and leaks ALL OVER THE COUNTER...AGAIN! It's stupid...we check that the base is screwed on tight...and it's a crap shoot! I bought this blender because of the lofty reputation Oster has. If the base would stay on...we would love this thing. But holy cow! I'm over it. Off to the Goodwill it goes...*NOTE the blender pitcher just lifts off with no signs of leaking until you lift it off and the bottom has unscrewed itself...and the entire coffee smoothie spews out all over the counter!!!
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Bearings go bad
customer_reviews.text: Amazing power for the price. However, after 6 months of use bearing went bad on whirlwind blade and I cannot find the replacement parts. Very disappointed and can not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: The taller portion of blade doesn’t completely pull the food down as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The taller piece to prevent jar jam works ok but I expected it to work much better.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Griego

customer_reviews.title: It’s good, but....
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot because it’s more convenient than a food processor, but when I make a smoothie, it leaks some, not a whole lot, but some and I know I have everything in place as it should be. That’s why I took A star away.
customer_reviews.author: judith vorndran

customer_reviews.title: Good machine
customer_reviews.text: Good replacement for the same model we have had for xx years! Old one just wore out its gear teeth after decades of constant use.
customer_reviews.author: Masterprof

customer_reviews.title: Not as powerful as my last Oster...
customer_reviews.text: Not as powerful as my last Oster, but it still does the job
customer_reviews.author: Ashlyn

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money $
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking blender, works nicely and I love the beehive motor design.
customer_reviews.author: Deyci Castillejos

customer_reviews.title: Love it can't say anymore then that
customer_reviews.text: Love it can't say anymore then that.. Does and absolute best job ever on all my blending needs. I make lots of smoothies during the hot months the best thing I invested and the price was just right.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: This blender does the job. I like the look of it, I like the simplicity, I like that blending canister is made of good thick glass and that the base only has one option for blending. I do find it hard to lock the top to the base and when I turn it on I feel the need to hold it in place as it will move around a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Demon Blender
customer_reviews.text: 2nd time around with this product. Screeches and howls. Will not buy again
customer_reviews.author: catsarebest

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is made cheaply compared to the one I bought 4 years ago
customer_reviews.author: Shari Cahill

customer_reviews.title: Very good blender!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! This is fantastic! Blends faster than fast and is fairly quiet in comparison to my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Ninadetusojos

customer_reviews.title: Super blender. Its everything it's supposed to be
customer_reviews.text: Super blender.Its everything it's supposed to be.Especially like the glass holder.Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Freddy H

customer_reviews.title: Really quality but really loud.
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful and heavy duty. It's really quality but it's really loud. My children are young and they scream when I turn it on.
customer_reviews.author: joe

product_meta.title: Oster Classic Series Whirlwind Blender PLUS Food Chopper
product_meta.description: Style Name:BlenderJar jam-ups are a thing of the past with the revolutionary Oster Whirlwind Blender. Smooth, consistent results are yours with our innovative blade design that reaches up to blend ingredients better than ever before! DURALAST All Metal Drive metal-to-metal connection allows you to blend up to 10,000 smoothies.
feature_bullets: Food Chopper - 3-cup BPA-free jar and stainless steel S-blade puts pep into your prep
2 Speeds - Make It Fresh with HIGH/LOW toggle switch
6-Cup Boroclass Glass Jar - Dishwasher safe for easy clean up
2-Ounce Filler Cap - Built in markings to measure and pour ingredients while blending
Whirlwind Blade technology ensures an even blend every time
Oster 10 Year DURALAST All-Metal Drive Limited Warranty for lasting durability

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars189 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
